settings.name: Resampling Frequency
settings.description: The time frequency of track resampling before binning. Accepts any `unit` value greater than a second from https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.Timedelta.html

settings.name: Maximum Segment Length
settings.description: Remove segments with greater than this time between fixes. Accepts any `unit` value greater than a second from https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.Timedelta.html

settings.name: Z Column Name
settings.description: The name of the column that stores the HAE.

settings.name: Kernel Radius
settings.description: The radius of the kernel in grid units.

settings.name: Latitude Grid Dimension
settings.description: The number of latitudinal grid cells.

settings.name: Longitude Grid Dimension
settings.description: The number of longitudinal grid cells.

settings.name: Altitude Grid Dimension
settings.description: The number of altitudinal grid cells.

settings.name: KDE Percentile
settings.description: Display the most frequently occupied voxels that make up the given percent of the total time spent.

settings.name: Show Topography
settings.description: Display a topographic map from SRTM1_ELLIP underneath the voxels.
